archer-pull-up.name: Archer pull-up
archer-pull-up.description: One arm does most of the work while the other assists

instructions.starting_position: Wide grip hang; pull toward one arm
instructions.movement: Working arm bends fully, assisting arm stays straight Keep straight arm engaged, not passive.
instructions.return: Lower with control, alternate sides

instructions.starting_position: Hinge at hips, soft knees; grip just outside shoulders
instructions.movement: Pull bar to lower chest Keep torso angle constant. Drive elbows past torso at top.
instructions.return: Lower to full arm extension Use controlled movement. Maintain constant torso angle.

instructions.starting_position: Hold barbell at arm's length, overhand grip
instructions.movement: Shrug shoulders toward ears, arms straight Lift straight up, don't roll shoulders. Hold 1-2 seconds at top.
instructions.return: Hold briefly at top, lower with control Lift straight up without rolling. Keep arms straight.

cable-close-grip-pulldown.name: Cable close grip pulldown
cable-close-grip-pulldown.description: Narrow grip pulldown for lower lat emphasis

instructions.starting_position: Close-grip handle on high pulley; sit and grasp with palms facing
instructions.movement: Pull to upper chest, squeezing shoulder blades Lean back slightly. Drive elbows down and back.
instructions.return: Return to full arm extension Pulling behind head.

cable-underhand-pulldown.name: Cable underhand pulldown
cable-underhand-pulldown.description: Underhand grip pulldown for biceps involvement

instructions.starting_position: Underhand grip, shoulder-width; thighs secured
instructions.movement: Pull bar to upper chest, squeezing back Lean back slightly, chest up. Pull with back, not just arms.
instructions.return: Return to full extension Excessive lean-back.

chin-up.name: Chin-up
chin-up.description: Underhand grip pull-up with biceps emphasis

instructions.starting_position: Hang with palms facing you, shoulder-width
instructions.movement: Pull up until chin clears bar Lead with chest, not chin. Keep elbows forward.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Keep shoulders down and back. Craning neck to clear bar.

instructions.starting_position: Bar over mid-foot; grip just outside knees
instructions.movement: Back flat, chest up; drive through floor Squeeze lats to keep bar against body. Push floor away rather than pulling bar.
instructions.return: Stand tall, hips and knees locked Lower by hinging hips first, then knees Maintain neutral spine. Keep bar close to body. Use smooth, controlled movement.

dumbbell-pullover.name: Dumbbell pullover
dumbbell-pullover.description: Stretching movement for lats and chest

instructions.starting_position: Lie across bench, shoulders on pad, hips unsupported
instructions.movement: Hold dumbbell overhead, slight elbow bend Keep hips low for maximum stretch. Maintain elbow angle throughout.
instructions.return: Lower behind head until deep lat stretch Pull back over chest Keep arms straight. Raising hips.

instructions.starting_position: Hand and knee on bench; dumbbell in opposite hand
instructions.movement: Pull to hip Row toward hip, not armpit. Keep back flat and parallel.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Rotating torso to heave the weight up. Cutting the rep short at the top.

inverted-row.name: Inverted row
inverted-row.description: Bodyweight horizontal pull on low bar or rings

instructions.starting_position: Bar at waist height; hang underneath, heels on ground
instructions.movement: Pull chest to bar Body rigid from ankles to shoulders.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Hips sagging or piking. Leading with chin.

instructions.starting_position: Thighs secured; grip wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Pull bar to upper chest, slight lean-back Pull elbows toward back pockets. Chest up to meet the bar.
instructions.return: Return to full extension overhead Pulling behind neck. Excessive lean-back.

instructions.starting_position: Hang with palms away, wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Pull up until chin clears bar Drive elbows toward hips.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Keep shoulders down and back. Use strict form without momentum.

prerequisites.notes: Pull shoulder blades down and back first

instructions.starting_position: Anchor overhead; kneel or stand gripping band
instructions.movement: Pull to shoulder level, elbows to sides Lean back slightly for better angle.
instructions.return: Return overhead with control Elbows flaring wide. Keep shoulders down and back.

instructions.starting_position: Anchor at chest height; arms extended
instructions.movement: Pull elbows back, hands to ribs Squeeze shoulder blades at contraction. Keep elbows close.
instructions.return: Return under tension Letting band snap back. Keep shoulders down and back.

instructions.starting_position: Feet on platform, knees slightly bent; grip handle
instructions.movement: Pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades Chest tall throughout. Elbows straight back, not out.
instructions.return: Return to arm extension with slight protraction Excessive torso rocking. Hunching at extension.

instructions.starting_position: Underhand grip, arms extended
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Keep elbows pinned at sides. EZ bar reduces wrist strain.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Use strict form without momentum. Elbows drifting forward.

barbell-preacher-curl.name: Barbell preacher curl
barbell-preacher-curl.description: Preacher bench curl for strict isolation

instructions.starting_position: Armpits on pad top; arms extended
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Keep upper arms pressed into pad. Stop short of lockout for tension.
instructions.return: Lower to near-full extension Lifting off the pad. Maintain neutral alignment.

bodyweight-biceps-curl.name: Bodyweight biceps curl
bodyweight-biceps-curl.description: Curl using bodyweight on low bar or rings

instructions.starting_position: Bar at waist height; supinated grip, body angled
instructions.movement: Curl up bending only at elbows Body rigid from head to heels. Feet closer to bar = harder.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Pulling with shoulders. Hips piking or sagging.

instructions.starting_position: Low pulley; face machine, grip bar
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Elbows pinned at sides. Constant tension - no rest at bottom.
instructions.return: Lower maintaining tension Elbows drifting forward.

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbells at sides, palms forward
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Elbows pinned; only forearms move. Supinate as you curl for peak contraction.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Elbows drifting. Use strict form without momentum.

instructions.starting_position: Sit with legs spread; elbow braced on inner thigh
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulder Upper arm locked against thigh. Go lighter than regular curls.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Elbow lifting off thigh. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbells at sides, palms facing each other
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders, neutral grip Wrists locked neutral, no rotation. Emphasizes brachialis and forearms.
instructions.return: Lower with control Rotating wrists during curl. Use strict form without momentum.

dumbbell-incline-curl.name: Dumbbell incline curl
dumbbell-incline-curl.description: Incline bench curl for increased stretch

instructions.starting_position: Incline 45-60 degrees; arms hanging
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders, upper arms stationary Arms hang straight for full stretch. Keep upper arms stationary.
instructions.return: Lower to full extension Elbows coming forward. Use strict form without momentum.

machine-preacher-curl.name: Machine preacher curl
machine-preacher-curl.description: Machine preacher curl for guided isolation

instructions.starting_position: Armpits on pad; grip handles
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Upper arms pressed into pad. Stop short of lockout.
instructions.return: Lower to near-full extension Lifting off pad. Maintain neutral alignment.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band; palms up
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders Elbows pinned to sides. Control the eccentric.
instructions.return: Lower with control Elbows drifting forward. Body swing.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band; palms facing each other
instructions.movement: Curl toward shoulders, neutral wrist Neutral wrist throughout. Elbows pinned.
instructions.return: Lower with control Rotating wrists. Use strict form without momentum.

barbell-calf-raise.name: Barbell calf raise
barbell-calf-raise.description: Standing calf raise with barbell on back

instructions.starting_position: Bar on upper back; heels hanging off platform
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes as high as possible Torso upright throughout. Pause at top for contraction.
instructions.return: Lower heels below platform for full stretch Bar shifting. Use controlled tempo.

instructions.starting_position: Heels hanging off platform; dumbbell in one hand
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes as high as possible Switch dumbbell hand each set. Pause at top.
instructions.return: Lower heels below platform Use controlled tempo. Bending knees.

instructions.starting_position: Heels on platform, toes hanging off
instructions.movement: Raise toes as high as possible Hold contraction at top.
instructions.return: Lower with control Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: Sit with balls of feet on block; dumbbells on lower thighs
instructions.movement: Push through toes to raise heels Pad under dumbbells for comfort. Weight centered over knee.
instructions.return: Lower heels below platform Dumbbells rolling forward. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band, balls of feet
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes against resistance Handles at shoulder height for tension. Pause and squeeze at top.
instructions.return: Lower with control Band going slack. Bending knees.

seated-calf-raise-machine.name: Seated calf raise machine
seated-calf-raise-machine.description: Machine seated calf raise for soleus

instructions.starting_position: Balls of feet on platform, knees under pad
instructions.movement: Release safety; lower heels Pad snug on lower thighs. Full range - drop heels fully.
instructions.return: Raise heels as high as possible; lower for stretch Use controlled tempo. Partial reps.

seated-resistance-band-calf-raise.name: Seated resistance band calf raise
seated-resistance-band-calf-raise.description: Seated band calf raise for soleus

instructions.starting_position: Sit; band under balls of feet, hold ends
instructions.movement: Push through toes to raise heels Knees at 90 degrees. Band taut throughout.
instructions.return: Lower with control Band going slack. Straightening legs.

instructions.starting_position: One leg on step edge
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes; lower heel below step Wall for balance only. Lower slowly for eccentric stretch.
instructions.return: Complete all reps before switching Using wall for lift assistance. Bending knee.

instructions.starting_position: Heels hanging off step edge
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes; squeeze at top Pause 1-2 seconds at top. Full range both directions.
instructions.return: Lower heels below step for stretch Use controlled tempo. Bending knees.

instructions.starting_position: Shoulders under pads; balls of feet on platform
instructions.movement: Rise onto toes as high as possible Soft knee bend. Pause at top, full drop at bottom.
instructions.return: Lower heels below platform for stretch Locking knees. Use controlled tempo.

instructions.starting_position: Eyes under bar; grip wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Unrack; lower to mid-chest Shoulder blades squeezed together. Feet driving into floor.
instructions.return: Press until lockout Use controlled tempo. Elbows flaring to 90 degrees.

barbell-decline-bench-press.name: Barbell decline bench press
barbell-decline-bench-press.description: Decline press for lower chest emphasis

instructions.starting_position: Decline bench, feet secured; grip wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Lower bar to lower chest Shoulder blades retracted. Touch lower chest.
instructions.return: Press to full extension Excessive elbow flare. Use controlled tempo.

instructions.starting_position: Pulleys at shoulder height; step forward
instructions.movement: Arms wide, slight elbow bend Fixed elbow angle throughout. Squeeze chest when hands meet.
instructions.return: Bring hands together; return wide Keep arms straight. Cables pulling you back.

chest-dip.name: Chest dip
chest-dip.description: Parallel bar dip with forward lean for chest

instructions.starting_position: Grip bars; lean forward ~30 degrees
instructions.movement: Lower until chest stretch Forward lean targets chest. Deep enough for stretch, not shoulder strain.
instructions.return: Press back up Staying upright (becomes tricep-dominant). Use controlled tempo.

instructions.starting_position: Feet on elevated surface; hands wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Lower chest toward floor Higher feet = harder. Body in straight line.
instructions.return: Press back up Hips sagging or piking. Elbows flaring to 90 degrees.

diamond-push-up.name: Diamond push-up
diamond-push-up.description: Close-grip push-up for inner chest and triceps

instructions.starting_position: Hands together in diamond shape under chest
instructions.movement: Lower chest to hands Elbows track along sides. Touch chest to hands.
instructions.return: Press back up Elbows flaring wide. Hands too far forward.

dumbbell-bench-press.name: Dumbbell bench press
dumbbell-bench-press.description: Dumbbell press for balanced chest development

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbells at chest level; feet flat
instructions.movement: Press up until arms extend Wrists stacked over elbows. Shoulder blades squeezed into bench.
instructions.return: Lower until upper arms parallel Use controlled tempo. Dumbbells drifting.

dumbbell-fly.name: Dumbbell fly
dumbbell-fly.description: Chest isolation with stretch and contraction

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbells above chest, palms facing
instructions.movement: Lower wide with slight elbow bend until stretch Fixed elbow angle throughout. Hugging a tree motion.
instructions.return: Squeeze chest to bring together Lowering below shoulder level. Keep arms straight.

dumbbell-incline-fly.name: Dumbbell incline fly
dumbbell-incline-fly.description: Incline fly for upper chest isolation

instructions.starting_position: Incline 30-45 degrees; dumbbells above chest
instructions.movement: Lower wide with slight elbow bend until stretch Fixed elbow angle throughout. Squeeze at top.
instructions.return: Squeeze chest to bring together Keep arms straight. Dropping too fast.

instructions.starting_position: Bench 30-45 degrees; grip wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Lower to upper chest near clavicle Shoulder blades retracted. Bar path slightly diagonal.
instructions.return: Press to lockout Lowering to lower chest. Incline too steep (shoulder press).

incline-dumbbell-press.name: Incline dumbbell press
incline-dumbbell-press.description: Incline dumbbell press for upper chest

instructions.starting_position: Bench 30-45 degrees; dumbbells at shoulder level
instructions.movement: Press until arms extend Shoulder blades pinched. Feet driving into floor.
instructions.return: Lower to shoulder level Incline above 45 degrees. Maintain neutral spine.

machine-chest-press.name: Machine chest press
machine-chest-press.description: Machine chest press with guided movement

instructions.starting_position: Handles at chest level
instructions.movement: Press forward until arms extend Back flat against pad. Push with chest.
instructions.return: Return to start Seat too high (shoulders work).

instructions.starting_position: Hands wider than shoulders
instructions.movement: Lower chest to floor Elbows at 45 degrees. Rigid plank from head to heels.
instructions.return: Press back up Hips sagging or piking. Leading with head.

instructions.starting_position: Band at chest height or around back
instructions.movement: Press forward until arms extend Shoulder blades together. Shoulders down.
instructions.return: Return maintaining tension Band going slack. Keep shoulders down and back.

instructions.starting_position: Band behind at chest height; arms wide
instructions.movement: Bring hands together, hugging motion Fixed elbow angle throughout. Squeeze when hands meet.
instructions.return: Return wide Straightening arms fully. Keep arms straight.

instructions.starting_position: Exhale fully
instructions.movement: Pull belly button toward spine Practice on empty stomach. Pull navel inward, not just sucking in.
instructions.return: Hold 10-20 seconds, breathing shallowly Holding breath completely. Pushing abs out.

barbell-deadlift.name: Barbell deadlift
barbell-deadlift.description: Compound lift from floor to hip

instructions.starting_position: Feet hip-width; bar over mid-foot
instructions.movement: Hinge and grip just outside legs Bar close to body. Neutral spine throughout.
instructions.return: Drive through heels to stand; reverse to lower Maintain neutral spine. Bar drifting away. Use smooth, controlled movement.

instructions.starting_position: Kneel behind loaded bar; hands shoulder-width
instructions.movement: Roll forward, extending body toward floor Squeeze glutes throughout. Only go as far as you can return.
instructions.return: Use core to pull back Maintain neutral spine. Going too far and collapsing.

instructions.starting_position: Lie on back; hands behind head, legs lifted
instructions.movement: Bring knee to chest while extending opposite leg Rotate ribcage, not just elbows. Lower back pressed to floor.
instructions.return: Rotate elbow toward bent knee; alternate sides Pulling on neck. Rushing without full rotation.

bird-dog.name: Bird dog
bird-dog.description: Core stability with opposite arm/leg extension

instructions.starting_position: Hands and knees, neutral spine
instructions.movement: Extend opposite arm and leg simultaneously Hips level throughout. Move slowly.
instructions.return: Hold briefly; alternate sides Rotating hips. Maintain neutral spine.

instructions.starting_position: Kneel facing cable; rope at sides of head
instructions.movement: Crunch by flexing spine, elbows toward thighs Curl spine, don't hinge at hips. Arms fixed; abs do the work.
instructions.return: Return with control Pulling with arms. Sitting back instead of crunching.

instructions.starting_position: Stand sideways to low pulley; handle in far hand
instructions.movement: Bend away from cable Strictly lateral, no rotation. Control the return.
instructions.return: Return to upright; complete side before switching Twisting torso. Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: Cable high or low; stand sideways
instructions.movement: Arms extended; rotate torso diagonally Rotate through hips and core. Pivot on back foot.
instructions.return: Return with control Moving arms without torso rotation. Rounding spine during rotation.

instructions.starting_position: Lie on back; knees bent, feet flat
instructions.movement: Hands behind head or across chest Curl ribcage toward pelvis. Lower back pressed to floor.
instructions.return: Curl shoulders off floor; lower with control Pulling on neck. Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: Lie on back; arms up, knees bent 90 degrees
instructions.movement: Lower opposite arm and leg toward floor Lower back pressed to floor. Only go as far as back stays flat.
instructions.return: Return; alternate sides Maintain neutral spine. Moving too fast.

instructions.starting_position: Sit; lean back, hold dumbbell with both hands
instructions.movement: Rotate side to side, touching floor each side Lift feet to increase difficulty. Rotate ribcage, not just arms.
instructions.return: Core braced, chest up Use strict form without momentum. Rounding back.

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbell in one hand at side
instructions.movement: Bend sideways toward weight Strictly lateral plane. One dumbbell only.
instructions.return: Return by contracting opposite oblique Maintain upright posture. Dumbbells in both hands.

hanging-leg-raise.name: Hanging leg raise
hanging-leg-raise.description: Advanced core exercise hanging from bar

instructions.starting_position: Hang with arms extended; legs straight
instructions.movement: Raise legs to parallel or higher Curl pelvis up, not just legs. Shoulders down from ears.
instructions.return: Lower with control Use strict form without momentum. Dropping legs quickly.

instructions.starting_position: Lie on back; hands at sides or under lower back
instructions.movement: Raise straight legs toward ceiling Lower back pressed to floor. Bend knees if too difficult.
instructions.return: Lower with control; stop before touching floor Maintain neutral spine. Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: High plank; hands under shoulders
instructions.movement: Drive knee to chest; quickly switch legs Flat back throughout. Knees toward elbows for oblique focus.
instructions.return: Keep hips low and level Use controlled tempo. Knees stopping short.

instructions.starting_position: Forearms and toes; elbows under shoulders
instructions.movement: Straight line from head to heels Tuck pelvis slightly. Push floor away through forearms.
instructions.return: Brace core, squeeze glutes, hold Hips sagging.

instructions.starting_position: Band at chest height; hold at chest
instructions.movement: Stand perpendicular to anchor Hips and shoulders square.
instructions.return: Press hands out; resist rotation; return Rotating toward anchor. Arms drifting toward band.

instructions.starting_position: Anchor high or low; arms extended
instructions.movement: Rotate torso diagonally Rotate through hips and core. Pivot on back foot.
instructions.return: Return with control Arms moving without torso. Band snapping back uncontrolled.

instructions.starting_position: On side; elbow under shoulder, feet stacked
instructions.movement: Lift hips, straight line head to feet Body in straight line. Breathe normally.
instructions.return: Hold; switch sides Hips dropping. Torso rotating.

sit-up.name: Sit-up
sit-up.description: A classic core exercise that brings the torso all the way up to the knees

instructions.starting_position: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet secured or held down
instructions.movement: Place hands behind your head or across your chest Initiate the movement with your abs, not hip flexors. Keep your feet on the floor throughout. Control the descent.
instructions.return: Curl up through your spine until your torso is upright Lower with control back to the floor Pulling on your neck. Use controlled movement throughout.

superman.name: Superman
superman.description: A prone exercise where arms and legs are raised simultaneously

instructions.starting_position: Lie face down with arms extended overhead and legs straight
instructions.movement: Simultaneously lift your arms, chest, and legs off the floor Keep your neck in a neutral position. Don't hyperextend your lower back. Squeeze your glutes at the top.
instructions.return: Hold briefly at the top, squeezing your back and glutes Lower with control and repeat Looking up and straining your neck. Use smooth, controlled movement.

instructions.starting_position: Upper back against bench; bar over hips with pad
instructions.movement: Drive heels to lift hips until thighs parallel Chin tucked, ribs down. Shins vertical at lockout.
instructions.return: Squeeze glutes at top; lower with control Maintain neutral alignment.

barbell-stiff-leg-deadlift.name: Barbell stiff-leg deadlift
barbell-stiff-leg-deadlift.description: Hip hinge with minimal knee bend

instructions.starting_position: Bar at thigh level; legs nearly straight
instructions.movement: Push hips back; lower bar close to legs Slight knee bend throughout. Feel hamstring stretch at bottom.
instructions.return: Drive hips forward to stand Maintain neutral spine. Excessive knee bend.

instructions.starting_position: Wide stance, toes out; bar over mid-foot
instructions.movement: Grip inside legs; drive through floor, knees out Push knees out throughout. Chest proud, squeeze glutes at lockout.
instructions.return: Stand upright; lower with control Knees caving inward. Hips shooting up first.

instructions.starting_position: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
instructions.movement: Kick leg back, keeping it straight Leg straight or slightly bent. Focus on glute contraction.
instructions.return: Squeeze glute at top; return with control Use strict form without momentum. Maintain neutral alignment.

instructions.starting_position: Ankle cuff on low pulley; stand sideways
instructions.movement: Pull leg across body past standing leg Torso upright. Control both directions.
instructions.return: Return with control; switch sides Use strict form without momentum. Rotating hips.

instructions.starting_position: Ankle strap on low pulley; face machine
instructions.movement: Kick leg straight back Drive through heel. Limit range to what glute controls.
instructions.return: Squeeze glute at top; return with control Maintain neutral spine. Rotating hips open.

instructions.starting_position: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
instructions.movement: Extend leg straight back Torso upright. Squeeze glute at extension.
instructions.return: Return with control Maintain neutral spine. Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: Upper back against bench; dumbbell on hips
instructions.movement: Drive heels to lift hips to straight line Chin tucked, look forward. Shins vertical at top.
instructions.return: Lower with control Maintain neutral alignment. Looking up.

dumbbell-sumo-squat.name: Dumbbell sumo squat
dumbbell-sumo-squat.description: Wide-stance squat for glutes and adductors

instructions.starting_position: Wide stance, toes out 30-45 degrees; dumbbell hanging
instructions.movement: Squat down, chest up, knees over toes Push knees out. Thighs to parallel or below.
instructions.return: Drive through heels to stand Knees caving inward. Rising onto toes.

instructions.starting_position: Tabletop position; knee bent 90 degrees
instructions.movement: Lift one leg out to side, thigh parallel to floor Hips level and square. Initiate from glute.
instructions.return: Lower with control Rotating hips or torso. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Lie on back; knees bent, feet flat
instructions.movement: Drive heels to lift hips Push through heels. Stop at straight line shoulder to knee.
instructions.return: Squeeze glutes at top; lower with control Maintain neutral alignment. Knees caving.

instructions.starting_position: Legs together; pads on outer thighs
instructions.movement: Push legs apart; squeeze at widest point Lean forward for glute emphasis. Pause at full abduction.
instructions.return: Return with control Use smooth, controlled movement. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Side-lying; band above knees, feet together
instructions.movement: Raise top knee, feet pressed together Hips stacked vertically. Initiate from glute.
instructions.return: Lower with control Rolling hips backward. Separating feet.

instructions.starting_position: Band above knees; lie on back, feet flat
instructions.movement: Press knees out while bridging up Outward knee pressure throughout. Drive through heels.
instructions.return: Squeeze glutes; lower with control Knees caving inward. Losing band tension.

instructions.starting_position: One knee bent, other leg extended
instructions.movement: Drive heel to lift hips; keep level Hips square throughout. Push through planted heel.
instructions.return: Lower with control Pelvis rotating. Hip dropping.

instructions.starting_position: Hips on pad; arms crossed
instructions.movement: Lower torso by hinging at hips Squeeze glutes and hamstrings at top. Don't hyperextend past neutral.
instructions.return: Raise to straight line Maintain neutral spine.

barbell-good-morning.name: Barbell good morning
barbell-good-morning.description: Hip hinge with bar for hamstrings and lower back

instructions.starting_position: Bar on upper back; feet hip-width
instructions.movement: Hinge at hips until torso near parallel Slight knee bend, don't squat. Push hips back, not torso forward.
instructions.return: Drive hips forward to return Maintain neutral spine. Descending beyond flexibility.

barbell-romanian-deadlift.name: Barbell Romanian deadlift
barbell-romanian-deadlift.description: Barbell hip hinge for posterior chain

instructions.starting_position: Bar at hip level; overhand grip
instructions.movement: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend Bar in contact with legs. Stop descent when back rounds.
instructions.return: Lower along legs until stretch; drive hips to stand Keep bar close to body. Maintain neutral spine.

instructions.starting_position: Face down; ankles under pad
instructions.movement: Curl heels toward glutes; squeeze at top Hips pressed down throughout. Control eccentric.
instructions.return: Lower with control Lifting hips. Use controlled movement throughout.

instructions.starting_position: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
instructions.movement: Curl heel toward glute Thigh in line with standing leg. Control throughout.
instructions.return: Lower with control; switch legs Use strict form without momentum. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Dumbbells in front of thighs
instructions.movement: Hinge at hips with slight knee bend Dumbbells slide along legs. Squeeze glutes at top.
instructions.return: Lower along legs until stretch; drive hips to stand Maintain neutral spine. Excessive knee bend.

instructions.starting_position: One leg; dumbbell in opposite hand
instructions.movement: Hinge, extending free leg behind Hips square to ground. Torso and back leg move as unit.
instructions.return: Lower until torso near parallel; return Rotating pelvis open. Maintain neutral spine.

instructions.starting_position: GHD with feet secured, knees on pad
instructions.movement: Lower torso by extending knees Hips extended throughout. Pull heels toward glutes.
instructions.return: Curl back up by flexing knees Bending at hips. Maintain neutral alignment.

instructions.starting_position: Face down; pad on lower calves
instructions.movement: Curl heels toward glutes Hips pressed into pad. Plantarflex to reduce calf involvement.
instructions.return: Lower with control Lifting hips. Stopping short of full flexion.

instructions.starting_position: Kneel; ankles secured
instructions.movement: Lower forward by extending knees Straight line knee to shoulder. Only lower as far as you can control.
instructions.return: Pull back up with hamstrings Breaking at hips. Falling forward uncontrolled.

instructions.starting_position: Band under feet, looped behind neck
instructions.movement: Hinge at hips, push butt back Slight knee bend, don't squat. Neutral spine throughout.
instructions.return: Drive hips forward to stand Maintain neutral spine. Squatting instead of hinging.

instructions.starting_position: Band anchored low; around ankles, face down
instructions.movement: Curl heels toward glutes Hips pressed to floor. Squeeze at peak contraction.
instructions.return: Lower with control Lifting hips. Band snapping legs down.

instructions.starting_position: Pad on lower calves; legs extended
instructions.movement: Curl heels under seat Back against pad. Pause at peak contraction.
instructions.return: Return with control Maintain upright posture. Stopping short of full flexion.

barbell-back-squat.name: Barbell back squat
barbell-back-squat.description: Compound lower body lift for strength and mass

instructions.starting_position: Bar on upper back (high bar) or rear delts (low bar)
instructions.movement: Unrack, feet shoulder-width; squat to parallel or below Push knees out in direction toes point. Keep bar path vertical over mid-foot.
instructions.return: Drive through feet to stand Hips shooting up first (good-morning squat). Knees caving inward out of the hole.

instructions.starting_position: Bar on front delts, elbows high
instructions.movement: Squat down while staying upright Keep elbows high throughout. Push knees forward to hit depth.
instructions.return: Drive through feet to stand Elbows dropping (bar rolls forward). Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Bar across upper back; step forward into lunge
instructions.movement: Lower until rear knee nearly touches floor Keep torso upright. Drive through front heel.
instructions.return: Push through front foot to stand Maintain upright posture. Letting the front knee cave inward.

instructions.starting_position: Bar across upper back; split stance
instructions.movement: Lower until rear knee nearly touches floor Most weight on front foot. Maintain upright torso.
instructions.return: Push through front foot to stand Letting the front knee cave inward. Use controlled tempo.

barbell-step-up.name: Barbell step-up
barbell-step-up.description: Step-up with barbell for unilateral leg work

instructions.starting_position: Bar across upper back; face box at knee height
instructions.movement: Step up, driving through heel Don't push off with back foot. Keep torso upright.
instructions.return: Step down with control Using the back leg to push up. Maintain upright posture.

instructions.starting_position: Feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out
instructions.movement: Squat to parallel or below Push knees out in direction toes point. Weight distributed across whole foot.
instructions.return: Drive through feet to stand Knees collapsing inward. Shifting weight onto toes.

dumbbell-goblet-squat.name: Dumbbell goblet squat
dumbbell-goblet-squat.description: Front-loaded squat for learning squat mechanics

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbell vertically at chest, cupping top end
instructions.movement: Squat down, keeping weight close to chest Let elbows track inside knees at bottom. Use weight as counterbalance to sit deeper.
instructions.return: Drive through feet to stand Dumbbell drifting forward. Rounding upper back.

dumbbell-lunge.name: Dumbbell lunge
dumbbell-lunge.description: Unilateral leg exercise for strength and balance

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbells at sides; step forward into lunge
instructions.movement: Lower until back knee nearly touches floor Step far enough for both knees to reach 90 degrees. Drive through heel, not ball of foot.
instructions.return: Push through front foot to stand Step too short (knee tracks too far forward). Back knee slamming into ground.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on box holding dumbbells at sides
instructions.movement: Lower one foot by bending standing leg Control descent with standing leg. Keep hips level.
instructions.return: Touch heel lightly, then push back up Letting the knee cave inward. Dropping down without control.

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbells at sides; face platform
instructions.movement: Step up, driving through that foot Don't push off with trailing foot. Place entire foot on box.
instructions.return: Step down with control Using back leg to push off. Knee caving inward.

instructions.starting_position: Squat to parallel, then explode upward
instructions.movement: Fully extend hips, knees, and ankles Absorb landing through ankles, knees, hips. Swing arms up for added power.
instructions.return: Land softly and immediately descend Landing with locked-out legs. Knees collapsing inward on landing.

instructions.starting_position: Pad on lower shins; back against seat
instructions.movement: Extend legs until straight Squeeze quads at lockout. Dorsiflex toes for more quad activation.
instructions.return: Lower with control Lifting hips off seat. Maintain neutral alignment.

instructions.starting_position: Feet shoulder-width on platform
instructions.movement: Lower until 90 degrees at knee Keep lower back flat against pad. Feet high = glutes; feet low = quads.
instructions.return: Press back up without full lockout Lower back rounding off pad. Use controlled tempo.

pistol-squat.name: Pistol squat
pistol-squat.description: Single-leg squat requiring strength and mobility

instructions.starting_position: Stand on one leg, other extended forward
instructions.movement: Lower until hamstring touches calf Reach arms forward as counterbalance. Keep standing heel on ground.
instructions.return: Drive through standing foot to rise Extended leg touching ground.

instructions.starting_position: Sit with band anchored behind; loop around ankle
instructions.movement: Extend knee until leg is straight Thigh pressed against seat. Dorsiflex toe for more quad engagement.
instructions.return: Return with control Thigh lifting off seat. Band snapping back uncontrolled.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band, feet shoulder-width
instructions.movement: Hold handles at shoulders; squat to parallel Maintain tension even at bottom. Accelerate through sticking point.
instructions.return: Stand against band's resistance Handles pulling you forward.

instructions.starting_position: Bar at thigh level; overhand grip
instructions.movement: Raise in front to shoulder height Slight elbow bend. Shoulder height, not higher.
instructions.return: Lower with control Use strict form without momentum. Maintain neutral spine.

instructions.starting_position: Bar at collarbone; grip just outside shoulders
instructions.movement: Press overhead; head moves back then forward Squeeze glutes and brace core. Shrug at lockout.
instructions.return: Lock out over mid-foot; lower to collarbone Excessive layback. Pressing forward.

instructions.starting_position: Bent over; wide grip
instructions.movement: Pull to upper chest, elbows flared Elbows high and outward. Focus on rear delt contraction.
instructions.return: Lower with control Elbows close to body. Use controlled movement throughout.

barbell-upright-row.name: Barbell upright row
barbell-upright-row.description: Upright pull for shoulders and traps

instructions.starting_position: Bar at thighs; shoulder-width grip
instructions.movement: Pull along body until upper arms parallel Lead with elbows, higher than wrists. Wider grip reduces impingement.
instructions.return: Lower with control Pulling above chest level. Narrow grip if discomfort.

cable-lateral-raise.name: Cable lateral raise
cable-lateral-raise.description: Cable lateral raise with constant tension

instructions.starting_position: Low pulley; stand sideways, handle in far hand
instructions.movement: Raise arm to parallel Fixed elbow bend throughout. Lead with elbow.
instructions.return: Lower with control Keep shoulders down and back. Raising above parallel.

cable-reverse-fly.name: Cable reverse fly
cable-reverse-fly.description: Cable reverse fly for rear delts

instructions.starting_position: Between pulleys at shoulder height; cross-grip
instructions.movement: Pull outward in arc with slight elbow bend Slight elbow bend throughout. Focus on rear delt squeeze.
instructions.return: Squeeze rear delts; return with control Use controlled movement throughout. Excessive elbow bend.

cable-y-raise.name: Cable Y raise
cable-y-raise.description: Cable Y raise for lateral delts

instructions.starting_position: Low cables; cross-grip handles
instructions.movement: Raise arms to Y shape Slight elbow bend. Use shoulders, not traps.
instructions.return: Lower with control Keep shoulders down and back. Excessive weight.

dumbbell-arnold-press.name: Dumbbell Arnold press
dumbbell-arnold-press.description: Shoulder press with rotation through the movement

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you
instructions.movement: Press up while rotating palms to face forward at top Rotate smoothly throughout. Press directly overhead, not forward.
instructions.return: Reverse motion as you lower Rushing the rotation. Use controlled movement throughout.

dumbbell-front-raise.name: Dumbbell front raise
dumbbell-front-raise.description: An isolation exercise for the front deltoids

instructions.starting_position: Stand with dumbbells at thighs, palms facing back
instructions.movement: Raise arms forward to shoulder height Keep a slight bend in elbows throughout. Stop at shoulder height; higher shifts work to traps. Keep torso still; avoid swaying backward.
instructions.return: Lower with control Maintain upright posture. Letting dumbbells drift inward toward midline.

dumbbell-lateral-raise.name: Dumbbell lateral raise
dumbbell-lateral-raise.description: An isolation exercise targeting the side deltoids

instructions.starting_position: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing in
instructions.movement: Raise arms out to the sides until parallel to floor Lead with elbows, keeping them slightly higher than wrists. Tilt pinkies up as if pouring water from a pitcher. Use a weight that allows strict form for 10+ reps.
instructions.return: Lower with control Keep shoulders down and back. Raising arms above shoulder level.

dumbbell-rear-delt-fly.name: Dumbbell rear delt fly
dumbbell-rear-delt-fly.description: An isolation exercise targeting the rear deltoids

instructions.starting_position: Hinge forward until torso is near parallel to floor
instructions.movement: Let dumbbells hang below chest with slight elbow bend Keep torso angle constant; don't rise as you lift. Think about leading with elbows, not hands. Pause briefly at the top to feel rear delts contract.
instructions.return: Raise arms out to sides, squeezing rear delts at top Lower with control Rising up to make the lift easier. Pulling with traps instead of rear delts.

dumbbell-shoulder-press.name: Dumbbell shoulder press
dumbbell-shoulder-press.description: A vertical pressing movement for shoulder development

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms forward
instructions.movement: Press overhead until arms fully extend Bring dumbbells slightly together at the top. Keep wrists stacked over elbows throughout. Sit with back supported to isolate shoulders more.
instructions.return: Lower to shoulder height Excessive lower back arch to cheat the weight up. Keep elbows tucked.

dumbbell-upright-row.name: Dumbbell upright row
dumbbell-upright-row.description: Targets lateral delts and upper traps

instructions.starting_position: Hold dumbbells at thighs, palms facing body
instructions.movement: Pull up along body, leading with elbows Keep elbows higher than hands. Keep weights close to body.
instructions.return: Raise until elbows at shoulder height, then lower Pulling too high (shoulder impingement risk). Using too narrow a grip.

handstand-push-up.name: Handstand push-up
handstand-push-up.description: An advanced vertical pressing movement in a handstand position

instructions.starting_position: Kick up into a handstand against a wall, hands shoulder-width plus
instructions.movement: Lower until head gently touches the floor Point fingers slightly outward for wrist comfort. Keep ribs stacked over hips; avoid banana-back arch. Push head through at the top for full lockout.
instructions.return: Press back up to full arm extension Losing contact with the wall and falling off balance. Maintain neutral spine.

incline-pike-push-up.name: Incline pike push-up
incline-pike-push-up.description: Pike push-up with hands elevated to reduce load

instructions.starting_position: Hands on elevated surface; raise hips into inverted V
instructions.movement: Lower head toward surface by bending elbows Higher surface = easier; progress to lower over time. Keep legs straight throughout.
instructions.return: Press back up Letting hips sag. Using an unstable surface.

machine-shoulder-press.name: Machine shoulder press
machine-shoulder-press.description: A guided overhead press using a machine for stability

instructions.starting_position: Adjust seat so handles align with shoulders
instructions.movement: Press handles overhead until arms fully extend Keep back pressed firmly against the pad. Press handles straight up, not forward. Focus on feeling deltoids work, not just pushing.
instructions.return: Lower to starting position Maintain neutral spine. Stopping short of full lockout.

pike-push-up.name: Pike push-up
pike-push-up.description: Push-up variation with vertical pressing angle

instructions.starting_position: From push-up position, raise hips into inverted V
instructions.movement: Lower head toward floor between hands Keep legs straight to maximize shoulder angle. Hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
instructions.return: Press back up Letting hips drop during press. Keep elbows tucked.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band; hold handles at sides
instructions.movement: Raise arms out until parallel to floor Lead with elbows, not hands. Tilt pinkies higher than thumbs at top.
instructions.return: Lower with control Keep shoulders down and back.

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band center; hold handles at shoulders
instructions.movement: Press overhead until lockout Press straight up, not forward. Stack wrists over elbows at start.
instructions.return: Lower to shoulder height Maintain upright posture. Pressing the handles forward instead of overhead.

barbell-skull-crusher.name: Barbell skull crusher
barbell-skull-crusher.description: A lying tricep extension using a barbell

instructions.starting_position: Lie on bench; hold bar with narrow grip, arms extended
instructions.movement: Lower bar toward forehead by bending elbows Keep upper arms vertical throughout. Lower to forehead or just behind head for full stretch. An EZ bar reduces wrist strain.
instructions.return: Extend arms to return to start Keep elbows tucked. Letting bar drift too far back, turning it into a pullover.

instructions.starting_position: Hold barbell overhead, arms extended
instructions.movement: Lower bar behind head by bending elbows Keep elbows pointed forward. Upper arms stay close to head.
instructions.return: Extend arms back overhead Maintain neutral spine. Letting elbows flare wide.

bench-dip.name: Bench dip
bench-dip.description: A tricep dip variation using a bench for support

instructions.starting_position: Place hands on bench edge behind you, fingers forward
instructions.movement: Walk feet out and lower by bending elbows to 90 degrees Keep back close to bench throughout. Extend legs straight for more difficulty; bend knees for less. Lock elbows fully at the top.
instructions.return: Push back up to full extension Descending past 90 degrees, stressing shoulders. Letting body drift too far from the bench.

cable-overhead-tricep-extension.name: Cable overhead tricep extension
cable-overhead-tricep-extension.description: An overhead tricep extension using cables for constant tension

instructions.starting_position: Set pulley low; face away and hold rope overhead
instructions.movement: Start with elbows bent, hands behind head Keep upper arms vertical and stationary. Lean slightly forward for balance and stretch. Cable tension emphasizes the stretched position.
instructions.return: Extend arms overhead, then return with control Maintain neutral spine. Letting elbows flare wide.

cable-tricep-pushdown.name: Cable tricep pushdown
cable-tricep-pushdown.description: A tricep isolation exercise using a cable machine

instructions.starting_position: Set pulley high; face machine and grip bar or rope
instructions.movement: Pin elbows at sides and push down until arms fully extend Keep elbows stationary throughout. Squeeze triceps at lockout. Try different attachments: straight bar, V-bar, rope.
instructions.return: Return to 90 degrees with control Letting elbows drift forward or back. Maintain upright posture.

close-grip-bench-press.name: Close-grip bench press
close-grip-bench-press.description: A bench press variation with narrow grip to emphasize triceps

instructions.starting_position: Lie on bench; grip bar shoulder-width or slightly narrower
instructions.movement: Lower bar to lower chest, keeping elbows close to sides Keep elbows tucked at about 30-45 degrees. Touch lower on chest than regular bench press. Don't go too narrow; shoulder-width is effective.
instructions.return: Press back up to full lockout Keep elbows tucked. Grip so narrow it strains wrists.

diamond-push-up-tricep.name: Close-grip push-up
diamond-push-up-tricep.description: A push-up variation with hands close together emphasizing triceps

instructions.starting_position: Start in push-up position with hands close together or forming a diamond
instructions.movement: Lower chest toward hands, keeping elbows close to sides Keep elbows tracking back along your ribs. Maintain rigid body from head to heels. The closer your hands, the more tricep emphasis.
instructions.return: Push back up to full extension Keep elbows tucked. Letting hips sag or pike up.

dumbbell-overhead-tricep-extension.name: Dumbbell overhead tricep extension
dumbbell-overhead-tricep-extension.description: An overhead extension for targeting the long head of the triceps

instructions.starting_position: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands
instructions.movement: Lower weight behind head by bending elbows Keep elbows pointing up and close to head. Upper arms stay stationary; only forearms move.
instructions.return: Extend arms back to start Keep elbows tucked. Maintain neutral spine.

dumbbell-skull-crusher.name: Dumbbell skull crusher
dumbbell-skull-crusher.description: A lying tricep extension targeting all three heads

instructions.starting_position: Lie on bench; hold dumbbells with arms extended over chest
instructions.movement: Lower weights toward forehead by bending only at elbows Keep upper arms vertical and stationary. Lower to forehead or just past for full stretch. Control the descent to protect elbow joints.
instructions.return: Extend back to start Letting upper arms drift back during the movement. Keep elbows tucked.

dumbbell-tricep-kickback.name: Dumbbell tricep kickback
dumbbell-tricep-kickback.description: An isolation exercise targeting the triceps with dumbbells

instructions.starting_position: Hinge forward; hold dumbbell with elbow bent 90 degrees, upper arm parallel to floor
instructions.movement: Extend arm back until straight Keep upper arm locked parallel to floor; only forearm moves. Squeeze tricep hard at full extension. Use lighter weight for strict form.
instructions.return: Return to 90 degrees Dropping the elbow as you extend. Use strict form without momentum.

resistance-band-overhead-tricep-extensio.name: Resistance band overhead tricep extension
resistance-band-overhead-tricep-extensio.description: An overhead tricep extension using resistance bands

instructions.starting_position: Stand on band; hold other end overhead with elbows bent
instructions.movement: Extend arms straight up Keep elbows pointing forward and close to head. Upper arms should stay stationary; only forearms move. Overhead position stretches the long head of triceps.
instructions.return: Lower behind head with control Keep elbows tucked. Maintain neutral spine.

resistance-band-tricep-pushdown.name: Resistance band tricep pushdown
resistance-band-tricep-pushdown.description: A tricep pushdown using resistance bands

instructions.starting_position: Anchor band above head; grip with both hands, elbows at 90 degrees
instructions.movement: Extend arms down until elbows lock out Pin elbows at your sides; only forearms move. Squeeze triceps hard at full extension. Don't let band snap back; control the return.
instructions.return: Return to 90 degrees with control Letting elbows drift forward during extension. Maintain upright posture.

tricep-dip.name: Tricep dip
tricep-dip.description: A compound pushing exercise targeting the triceps

instructions.starting_position: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms locked out
instructions.movement: Lower by bending elbows until upper arms are parallel to floor Stay upright to emphasize triceps; lean forward for more chest. Keep elbows pointing back, not flared out. Lock out fully at the top of each rep.
instructions.return: Push back up to full arm extension Descending too deep, stressing the shoulder capsule. Keep elbows tucked.
